summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing (100% success) and partial frontend testing. All backend endpoints working correctly. Frontend loads and basic navigation functional, but browser automation environment has stability issues preventing complete UI testing.

testing_environment_issues.issue: Playwright browser crashes with SIGSEGV signal during testing
testing_environment_issues.impact: Unable to complete full end-to-end frontend testing
testing_environment_issues.workaround: Manual testing or different browser automation setup needed

action_item_for_main_agent: Backend is fully functional. Frontend appears properly implemented but needs manual verification of complete user flow due to browser automation environment issues. Consider testing the full user journey manually or with a different testing approach.

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (basic loading and navigation working, full flow testing incomplete due to environment issues)
